name: aquatically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is connected with water or that involves living, growing, or happening in water: Watercress is an aquatically grown lettuce. Marine mammals give birth aquatically. See
aquatic
More examplesFewer examplesWhales breathe air through a blowhole and walleyes take oxygen aquatically, through gills.Their three children are aquatically inclined and take part in swimming competitions.He dyed his hair an aquatically blue-tinged silver. Most Arctic species mate aquatically.
